alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 27 at 9:41PM EDT until September 27 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Warrick County in southwestern Indiana... Spencer County in southwestern Indiana... North central Daviess County in northwestern Kentucky... Northeastern Henderson County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 840 PM CDT, two severe thunderstorms were located 7 miles northwest of Grandview, and near Newburgh, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Owensboro, Newburgh, Rockport, Grandview, Eureka, Chrisney, Tennyson, and Waitman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
